pages.title: Storage Interface
pages.text: A $(thing)remote access point$() that connects to a Storage Controller's network. Place anywhere and link to a controller to query items without being adjacent.$(br2)Peripheral type: $(thing)"storage_interface"$()$(br2)$(bold)Requires:$() Functional Storage mod (fxntstorage).$(br2)$(#4488CC)local si = peripheral.find("storage_interface")$(br)if si.isConnected() then$(br)  print(si.getBoxCount() .. " boxes")$(br)end$()

pages.title: Lua API
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)isConnected()$() → boolean — linked to a controller?$(br)$(li)$(thing)getPosition()$() → {x, y, z}$(br)$(li)$(thing)getControllerPosition()$() → {x, y, z} or nil$(br)$(li)$(thing)size()$() → int — slot count$(br)$(li)$(thing)list()$() → {slot → {name, count, displayName, maxCount}}$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemDetail(slot)$() → detailed info with tags$(br)$(li)$(thing)getBoxCount()$() → int$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemCount(itemId)$() → int$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemSummary()$() → [{name, displayName, count, boxes}]$(br)$(li)$(thing)findItems(query)$() → search by partial name/ID

pages.title: Usage Example
pages.text: $(bold)Remote inventory display:$()$(br2)$(#4488CC)local si = peripheral.find("storage_interface")$(br)local summary = si.getItemSummary()$(br)for _, item in ipairs(summary) do$(br)  print(item.displayName)$(br)  print("  Count: " .. item.count)$(br)  print("  Boxes: " .. item.boxes)$(br)end$()$(br2)The interface provides the same query methods as the Storage Controller but can be placed remotely — useful for building monitoring stations away from the main storage area.
